subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria beat his close friend Felix Neureuther of Germany in Zagreb, Croatia, at a World Cup night race, setting up a duel for this season’s slalom title.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria beat his close friend Felix Neureuther of Germany in Zagreb, Croatia, at a World Cup night race, setting up a duel for this season’s slalom title.
